There is a txt file in this torrent, i managed to translate it and it says:
1, to the official website to download the latest version of the TDU2 Beta version (do not use the first version of the time)
2, install the game, and upgrade to the latest version
3, the crack extract the files to the game's installation folder, overwrite the original EXE file
4, run "TestDrive2.exe" to start the game (Note: Do not use UpLauncher.exe start the game, otherwise it will not break automatically upgraded to version)
5, use the official server is open note
6, into the game, you will be prompted serial number is wrong, leave it alone, simply press OK to start after the normal game.

I can confirm it works.  Just install and run the testdrive2.exe afterwards. No need for a crack or serial.  Just make an offline profile.   My Norton Antivirus doesn't detect any virus.

Having said that, there doesn't seem to be much you can do. I drove around Ibiza for awhile, bought some new clothes, but the game got stuck in an endless loading loop when I visited the car dealership.  I haven't found any offline races yet. 

You can earn money by passing traffic, just go fast and pass them very closely.  Watch the top of the screen and you'll see money start to be made. Just bank it before you crash or you lose it.

Seems all this is really good for is to see what it will be like to cruise around Ibiza.

same here game got stuck in an endless loading loop when I visited the car dealership.

fix for endless loop: try alt+f4 during the loop and start the game again. after that you will be able to enter the car saloon. it works for me anyway..
you can then trade your shitty mustang for lancia delta intergrale or test drive few other cars..
but it's pointless in playing this game because there is no offline challenges, besides all the shitty driving physics..
oh yea, and you can store money in bank with enter.. and this way of collecting money sucks also..
